statements: SELECT * FROM wildlife_migration;
SELECT animal_name, migration_date FROM wildlife_migration;
SELECT id, animal_name, gps_coordinates, migration_date FROM wildlife_migration WHERE animal_name = 'Elephant';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_migration WHERE gps_coordinates IS NOT NULL ORDER BY migration_date DESC;
SELECT animal_name, ST_AsText(gps_coordinates) AS coordinates, TO_CHAR(migration_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS formatted_date FROM wildlife_migration WHERE migration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_migration WHERE animal_name = 'Elephant';
SELECT animal_name, migration_date FROM wildlife_migration WHERE migration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_migration ORDER BY migration_date DESC;
SELECT animal_name, ST_AsText(gps_coordinates) FROM wildlife_migration WHERE ST_Intersects(gps_coordinates, ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0, 1 0, 1 1, 0 1, 0 0))'));
SELECT animal_name, migration_date FROM wildlife_migration WHERE animal_name LIKE 'L%' OR animal_name LIKE 'G%' ORDER BY animal_name ASC, migration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM migration_routes WHERE route_distance > 100
SELECT animal_name, end_location FROM migration_routes WHERE start_location='Forest'
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type, geographic_coordinates FROM habitats
SELECT * FROM migration_routes ORDER BY route_distance DESC
SELECT animal_name, route_distance FROM migration_routes WHERE start_location='Desert'
SELECT * FROM migration_routes WHERE route_distance > 100 ORDER BY animal_name ASC
SELECT route_id, animal_name, route_distance FROM migration_routes WHERE start_location = 'Forest' OR end_location = 'River'
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM migration_routes WHERE animal_name IN ('Elephant', 'Giraffe') ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Savanna' ORDER BY habitat_name
SELECT * FROM migration_routes WHERE route_distance BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY route_distance DESC
SELECT * FROM wildlife_migration_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM wildlife_migration_routes;
SELECT route_id, migration_date FROM wildlife_migration_routes ORDER BY migration_date DESC;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT data_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM gps_data WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_migration_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, migration_date FROM wildlife_migration_routes WHERE migration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM wildlife_habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM gps_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type, COUNT(*) AS total_habitats FROM wildlife_habitats GROUP BY habitat_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_habitats DESC;
SELECT * FROM migration_data;
SELECT animal_name FROM migration_data WHERE gps_latitude > 30;
SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM animal_species JOIN habitats ON animal_species.habitat_id = habitats.id;
SELECT device_name, battery_level, last_sync FROM tracking_devices WHERE battery_level < 50 ORDER BY last_sync DESC;
SELECT species_name, migration_date FROM animal_species JOIN migration_data ON animal_species.species_name = migration_data.animal_name WHERE migration_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM migration_data WHERE gps_latitude > 40 AND migration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT animal_name, migration_date FROM migration_data WHERE gps_longitude < -80 ORDER BY migration_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, migration_status FROM animal_species JOIN tracking_devices ON animal_species.id = tracking_devices.animal_id WHERE battery_level < 50;
SELECT habitat_name, climate FROM habitats WHERE elevation > 2000 ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, last_sync FROM tracking_devices WHERE battery_level > 70 AND last_sync < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT * FROM migration_routes;
SELECT animal_id, migration_start, migration_end FROM migration_routes WHERE population_size > 100;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(animal_id) AS total_animals FROM tracked_animals GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT species, age, color, weight FROM animals WHERE weight > 50;
SELECT habitat_location, habitat_type, temperature FROM habitats WHERE precipitation < 50;
SELECT * FROM migration_routes WHERE population_size > 100 ORDER BY migration_start DESC;
SELECT animal_id, migration_start, migration_end FROM migration_routes WHERE animal_id = 5 AND route_location = 'forest' LIMIT 10;
SELECT species, age, color FROM animals INNER JOIN tracked_animals ON animals.animal_id = tracked_animals.animal_id WHERE tracked_animals.tracking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT habitat_location, habitat_type, temperature FROM habitats WHERE temperature < 20 AND precipitation > 30 ORDER BY habitat_location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM gps_data WHERE signal_strength > 50 AND altitude > 1000;
